dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 681 IH: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that Washington’s Birthday be observed on February 22, rather than the third Monday in February, of each year.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Wolf (for himself, Mr. Hurt, and Mr. Connolly) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that Washington’s Birthday be observed on February 22, rather than the third Monday in February, of each year.

section.header: Change in date for observance of Washington’s birthday

subsection.text: Section 6103(a) of title 5, United States Code, is amended by striking the item relating to Washington’s Birthday and inserting the following:
